identificationModule.briefTitle: COMbination of Clopidogrel and Aspirin for Prevention of Early REcurrence in Acute Atherothrombotic Stroke
identificationModule.officialTitle: COMbination of Clopidogrel and Aspirin for Prevention of REcurrence in Acute Atherothrombotic Stroke Study: Prospective, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Trial

armGroups.label: Combination therapy
armGroups.description: Administration of Aspirin + Clopidogrel for 30 days

armGroups.label: Monotherapy
armGroups.description: Administration of Aspirin + Clopidogrel placebo for 30 days

interventions.name: Clopidogrel placebo
interventions.description: Matching tablet, oral administration once daily

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants with new ischemic lesions after the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Distribution of Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) scores
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Day 30 after the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants with non-fatal stroke, myocardial infarction (MI) or cardiovascular death (composite endpoint, first-ever)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants with stroke (all kinds)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants with bleeding episode (major or minor)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants with symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

references.citation: Hong KS, Lee SH, Kim EG, Cho KH, Chang DI, Rha JH, Bae HJ, Lee KB, Kim DE, Park JM, Kim HY, Cha JK, Yu KH, Lee YS, Lee SJ, Choi JC, Cho YJ, Kwon SU, Kim GM, Sohn SI, Park KY, Kang DW, Sohn CH, Lee J, Yoon BW; COMPRESS Investigators. Recurrent Ischemic Lesions After Acute Atherothrombotic Stroke: Clopidogrel Plus Aspirin Versus Aspirin Alone. Stroke. 2016 Sep;47(9):2323-30. doi: 10.1161/STROKEAHA.115.012293. Epub 2016 Jul 14.
